item.title: Master Caution/ Warning Systems – Master Caution Lights (Pilot’s Glare Shield)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided master caution aural systems and all discrete caution lights are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard near affected Master Warning Light: "MASTER CAUTION LIGHT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
